GSD.description:
dmaengine: sprd: Cleanup in .remove() after pm_runtime_get_sync() failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit aa6e96cb21658496f21ea5db10ae49bbc79f5801. For more details please see the references link.
